decks.notes: The key concept of this deck is to utilize the aggressive strategy of the Aggro archetype with Magda, Brazen Outlaw as the commander. The deck focuses on playing efficient and fast creatures like Dwarves and Dragons to quickly overwhelm the opponent. It also includes a mix of burn spells like Lightning Bolt and Incinerate to control the board and finish off opponents. Additionally, the deck features cards like Torbran, Thane of Red Fell and Glorybringer to provide additional damage and pressure. Overall, the goal is to apply early pressure, maintain board control, and finish off opponents quickly before they have a chance to stabilize.
